name: ext_R5_ObservationDefinition_component
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.ObservationDefinition.component for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents ObservationDefinition.component from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ObservationDefinition|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.definition: Some observations have multiple component observations, expressed as separate code value pairs.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both
